processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value (find divisors and add to sum)

advice.text: You have started coding; focus now on turning the loop comment into detailed steps before writing code.
Think of the loop as: iterate candidate i, check if i divides n, and add i to sum when true.
Write sub-comments first: (1) loop i from 1 to n, (2) if n is divisible by i (remainder zero) then add i to sum, (3) after the loop print the sum; then implement those lines.
